Title: TYPO3 Brute Force Protection Bypass in backend login
Description: The backend login has a basic brute force protection implementation which pauses for 5 seconds if wrong credentials are given. This pause however could be bypassed by forging a special request, making brute force attacks on backend editor credentials more feasible.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.14, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.14 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.3.1
